IF (OBJECT_ID('users_audit') IS NULL) BEGIN CREATE TABLE users_audit ( id BIGINT NOT NULL IDENTITY(1, 1), user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, email NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, password NVARCHAR(512) NOT NULL, first_name NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, last_name NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, role_id BIGINT NOT NULL, modified_by VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, modified_date DATETIME NOT NULL, operation VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT PK_users_audit PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (id ASC),
CONSTRAINT CHK_users_audit_operation CHECK (operation in ('CREATED', 'DELETED')) ) END
